title: My Reads
description: The MyReads app provides a simple way to find new books and track your latest reads. Features include search books, add to bookshelf, track reads, and bulk move.

title: Explore the Nations
description: Explore The Nations features some of the top restaurants in The Nations. The app works with the Yelp and Google maps APIs to retrieve dynamic data about each location. In addition, Styled Components are used for applying custom styles.

title: Space Explorer
description: Explore stars, planets and other astronomical objects from the NASA database.
